An eager developer and graphic designer with full stack capabilities from an engineering and IT background, with an explosive passion for the ever growing field of technology. As BoomTech I take on a variety of projects to further advance my skill set and experience without limitation. Currently operating in Brooklyn, NY and fully capable to take on remote work.

I would like to continue to advance my experience in the development field and continuous work with many clients on a variety of products to gain greater insight in needs in the market. I would like to one day combine my skillsets in leading teams through full product  development workflow. I would like to lead with the foresight for scheduling, UX, testing, user interface design, server side structure, embedded systems needs, and network communication integrations to efficiently deliver an optimal product to maximize profit for clients and the users of their product.

details.detailTitle: Communicative * Motivated * *Quick to learn and implement new toolsets * Always learning * Open to Collaboration * Organized * Diligent * Meticulous

details.detailAddtl: I have a great passion for practicing martial arts and fitness. I have an eclectic taste for music including an interest in collecting records and practicing the art of DJing. I like to relax and enjoy playing table top with friends. I recently have been enthralled by Warhammer and plan to hopefully build and paint my own army. I have a short term goal set to build a sileighty conversion Nissan. At home I love to experiment in the kitchen, and read, while also in constant workflow with my own personal projects.

My workflow is generally similar for requests whether development or graphic design.When first contacted I may provide a client with a form to gather some information about the project, with which we can then follow up and discuss by meetup, phone, email, or Skype. I like to gather enough information so that I may properly outline specifications, strategize a plan to stay within budget of the client, while being able to delivery a minimum viable product within reasonable time frames. I am willing to sign NonDisclosure Agreements. I am completely open to working with a team already onboard and adapt to their workflow.

Projects require gathering enough research to move forward including competing products in the current market, outlining user stories, content strategy. I like to share with clients some work that may better provide focus for the product. Wireframing would typically be performed which would result outlining the core features of the product and its user acceptance tests to begin prototyping. We would also come up with a solid structure for the product, and keep scaling in mind.
With the features and core strategy in place prototyping is underway and the client would receive hi-fidelity design with rendered user flow and minimum viable products of the product.

Attacking the features would not begin without testing in mind which will also be helpful when the product is in production. Testing communication between the product and its User flow tests are also performed, as well as cross browser testing.

Clients would be provided with proper documentation to cover core functionality. We can also outline how to move forward with maintanence strategy and deployment. I am open to performing refactoring of anything I have implemented to meet any new specifications.
